dmca.title: Extremely Important!
dmca.body:
Charles,

I have just received a memorandum from Dean Ferraro charging you with engaging in computer use in violation of the "Appropriate Usage Policy".  He alleges you are using his name as your Instant Messenger handle.

I am sending you a copy of the charge letter and material on which the charge is based this afternoon through campus mail.  Additionally, I have indicated a date and time for you to meet with me to begin to resolve this charge. 

Finally, if you have been using Dean Ferraro
